author: joesomebody

comments.content:
hmm not Charlotte nor Eidict Neo...

but its close to those but no cigar
It’s Jaguar JC - as used by Jaguar Cars. Apparently it’s got out into the wild.

Yes, if you insist...

“The internet has free versions of JaguarJC Bold (1996), JaguarJC BookItalic (1996), and [JaguarJC Book](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153126/http:/www.pickafont.com/fonts/J/Jaguarjc%20Book.html) (1996), both medium-serifed fonts designed for and used by the Jaguar company.” Source: [Luc Devroye](http://web.archive.org/web/20080731153126/http:/cg.scs.carleton.ca/~luc/commercialfonts2.html)

Hello, I’m the designer of the logo and correct, it’s the Jaguar font.  
But since the logo is just a showcase work (Helion AG is an imaginative company) I think there’s no problem. :D
